markdownRemark.html:
OTQ Subscribers

I implement a login authentication in this site for closed contents and β version projects which are accessible to visitors who are logged in. I call the visitors who are logged in OTQ Subscribers.

OTQ Subscribers has two benefits.

1. Rights to join β version project.

In this time, I have some plans of projects. Before releasing official ver., I would like for many people to use my project and give me valuable feedbacks.

2. Closed Contents

OTQ Studio has closed contents, which will be near to very personal blog.

Basically, informations that seem to be valuable for someone are accessible to anyone in the Internet.

So closed contents won’t be valuable but personal. Maybe I’ll write about planning, creating, developing OTQ project.
